title: Hooray For Fly Guy!
description: Children will laugh out loud at the story and pictures in this sixth book in the easy-to-read Fly Guy series!"Flies can't play football," says the coach. But Fly Guy and Buzz are determined to prove him wrong. New readers will experience both pride and delight as they read the simple text and look at the funny pictures of Fly Guy trying to kick a football, go out for a pass, and tackle his friend Buzz. In the end, Fly Guy scores and gets to do his hilarious touchdown dance. Hooray for Fly Guy!
author: Tedd Arnold
